methods.makeResettableChunk:
Note: Java generics information - <ATTR extends io.deephaven.chunk.attributes.Any>

:return: io.deephaven.chunk.ResettableCharChunkChunk<ATTR>
methods.resetFromArray:
Reset the data and bounds of this chunk to a range or sub-range of the specified array.

:param array: (java.lang.Object) - The array
:param offset: (int) - The offset into array
:param capacity: (int) - The capacity this should have after reset
methods.resetFromChunk:
Reset the data and bounds of this chunk to a range or sub-range of the specified ChunkChunk.

:param other: (io.deephaven.chunk.ChunkChunk<ResettableCharChunkChunk.ATTR>) - The other ChunkChunk
:param offset: (int) - The offset into other
:param capacity: (int) - The capacity this should have after reset
